com.mindfusion.scheduling

Class AeroEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.ItemEffect
      • com.mindfusion.scheduling.AeroEffect

  • public final class AeroEffect
extends ItemEffect
    Represents an effect that adds semitransparency to the element and emphasizes its outline by adding a shade and an inner stroke.

    This effect can be applied to the elements in a Calendar by adding an instance of this class to the ItemEffects collection of the Calendar class.

    • Method Detail

      • getOpacity

        public float getOpacity()
        Description copied from class: AeroEffect
        Gets the opacity to apply to the element's background.

        Opacity varies in the range [0..1] where 0 indicates full transparency and 1 indicates the original transparency. Opacity has no effect on image backgrounds.

        Returns:
        A float value.

      • setOpacity

        public void setOpacity(float value)
        Description copied from class: AeroEffect
        Sets the opacity to apply to the element's background.

        Opacity varies in the range [0..1] where 0 indicates full transparency and 1 indicates the original transparency. Opacity has no effect on image backgrounds.

        Parameters:
        value - A float value.
